resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105845</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105845</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200862</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Charges and Fields </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lädt auf und Fängt auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frais et zones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cargas e campos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spese e campi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαπάνες και πεδία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cargas y campos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Move point charges around on the playing field and then view the electric field, voltages, equipotential lines, and more. It's colorful, it's dynamic, it's free. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung Punktladungen herum auf dem Spielen 
fangen auf und sehen dann das elektrische auffangen,
Spannungen, equipotential Zeilen und mehr an. Er ist bunt, es 
ist dynamisch, es ist frei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le point de mouvement charge autour sur la zone de
jeu et visualise alors le champ électrique, les tensions, les lignes 
équipotentielles, et les plus. Il est coloré, il est 
dynamique, il est libre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ponto do movimento carrega ao redor no campo 
jogando e vê então o campo elétrico, as tensões, as linhas 
equipotential, e o mais. É colorido, ele é dinâmico, ele 
está livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il punto di movimento si carica intorno sul campo 
da giuoco ed allora osserva il campo elettrico, le tensioni, le righe 
equipotential ed il più. È colorful, esso è dinamico, esso è
libero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι δαπάνες σημείου κίνησης γύρω στο παίζοντας πεδίο 
και εμφανίζουν έπειτα το ηλεκτρικό πεδίο, τις τάσεις, τις 
ισοδυναμικές γραμμές, και περισσότερων. Είναι ζωηρόχρωμο, 
είναι δυναμικό, είναι ελεύθερο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La punta del movimiento carga alrededor en el 
campo que juega y después opinión el campo eléctrico, los voltajes,
las líneas equipotential, y más. Es colorida, él es 
dinámica, él está libre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200862</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105845</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/charges-and-fields</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
